Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Cosmopolitan Of Las Vegas in Las Vegas (The Strip), you'll be minutes from Crystals at City Center and close to University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This 5-star resort is within close proximity of The Linq and High Roller.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 2995 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Your pillowtop bed comes with down comforters and Egyptian cotton sheets. Cable programming provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. Before a night out at the casino, the 3 outdoor swimming pools and 3 spa tubs are a perfect way to relax and recharge. This resort also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Planning an event in Las Vegas? This resort has 150000 square feet (13935 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times, and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Crystals at City Center - 0.1 km / 0 mi
The Linq - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
High Roller - 1 km / 0.6 mi
The Auto Collections - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Thomas and Mack Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Orleans Arena - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Bali Hai Golf Club - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
University of Nevada-Las Vegas - 2.8 km / 1.8 mi
Marjorie Barrick Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Welcome to Fabulous Las Vegas Sign - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for The Cosmopolitan Of Las Vegas is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Message.Text:
Room 1
From 2013-03-05 To 2030-12-31
Child policy
Persons under the age of twenty-one (21) are not permitted to stay.They have to stay with another person over the the age of twenty-one (21).

From 2011-04-11 To 2030-12-31
No Name Changes Allowed
Please note that accordingly to the hotel policy, NO name changes are allowed on confirmed bookings, once booked if changes to the names are required then the booking should be cancelled and re-booked.

From 2019-01-01 To 2030-12-31
Resort Fee
The hotel imposes a resort fee of $39.00 per room per night, plus tax, which is payable directly to the hotel by the pax. Includes Unlimited Wi-Fi, local and long distance call (within the continental U.S.), fitness center access, tennis court access (based on availability). Self Parking & Valet Parking

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Studio King Room with Terrace

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 41-50 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 01/Jan/2019 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: All booking must have first and last names at the time of booking - bookings with TBA or TBD names will be automatically cancelled by the hotel. Guest is responsible for paying the daily resort fee of $39 + tax per room per night directly to the hotel for all reservations, except for resort fee inclusive rate plans. Minimum check-in age is 21 years of age Rollaway Bed Information: - A rollaway bed is available for guests staying in a King bedded room for $35/night plus tax. - If the reservation is booked for 3 adults and the 3rd person fee of $35/night plus tax is paid for, the rollaway fee is waived. - If the 3rd guest is under 18 and the additional person fee does not apply and a rollaway is needed, the $35/night plus tax will apply. - Rollaway beds may only be sent to rooms with King inventory and there is a maximum of one rollaway bed per room. A credit card with $50 per night is required as an incidental authorization upon check-in. SELF-PARKING RATES for non-staying guests 0-1 hour: Complimentary 1-4 hours: $10 4-24 hours: $15 24+ hours: $15 VALET PARKING RATES for non-staying guests 0-4 hours: $15 4-24 hours: $20 24+ hours: $20 Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

RoomType.text: Double Studio King Room with Terrace

Message.Text: Note: *All of guest rooms have a non smoking policy. Smoking is allowed on the terraces only.* *All guests must be at least 21 years of age.* *There is a $35.00 + tax resort fee payable by the guest.* Prices are based on single or double occupancy. You may incur additional charges at the time of check-in for additional room occupants as well as the Resort Fees and taxes applied on the additional occupants charges.

Essential Information: Room 1
RESORTFEE Charges: 245.00 USD (Excluded i.e. pay to hotel at the time of check-In)
